trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> objects.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> class to store and manage <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> objects for a control.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> 저장 하 고 관리할 클래스 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> 컨트롤에 대 한 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Control developers can use this class to contain a set of styles that apply to different portions of the control.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 개발자가 컨트롤의 다른 부분에 적용 되는 스타일 집합을 포함 하도록이 클래스를 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The collection dynamically increases in size as objects are added.
trans-unit.target: 개체가 추가 될 때 동적으로 컬렉션의 크기가 늘어납니다.

trans-unit.source: Indexes in this collection are zero-based.
trans-unit.target: 이 컬렉션의 인덱스는 0부터 시작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count%2A> property to determine how many objects are in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count%2A> 속성을 컬렉션에 있는 개체의 수를 확인 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> methods and properties to provide the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: 또한 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> 메서드 및 속성을 다음 기능을 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Add%2A> method to add a single style to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Add%2A> 메서드를 단일 스타일 컬렉션에 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Insert%2A> method to add a style at a particular index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Insert%2A> 메서드를 컬렉션에서 특정 인덱스에 스타일을 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Remove%2A> method to remove a style from the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Remove%2A> 메서드를 컬렉션에서 스타일을 제거 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method to remove the style located at a particular index.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.RemoveAt%2A> 스타일을 제거 하려면 메서드는 특정 인덱스에 위치 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine whether a particular style is already in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Contains%2A> 메서드를 이미 특정 스타일 컬렉션에 적용 되는지 확인 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to retrieve the index of a style within the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.IndexOf%2A> 컬렉션 내에서 스타일의 인덱스를 검색 하는 메서드입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove all the styles from the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> 메서드를 컬렉션에서 모든 스타일을 제거 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object to add to the collection.
Appends a specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object to the end of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection" /> object.
The index at which the style was added to the collection.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Add%2A> method to append the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Add%2A> 메서드를 지정 된 추가 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> 개체의 끝에는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object to the collection at a specific index location, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 추가 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> 개체를 사용 하 여 특정 인덱스 위치의 컬렉션에는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Insert%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> to locate within the collection.
Determines whether the specified style is contained within the collection.
<see langword="true" /> if the style is in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Contains%2A> method determines equality by using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Contains%2A> 메서드를 사용 하 여 일치 여부를 확인는 <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> 에서 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the copied styles.
The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in <c>styleArray</c> at which copying begins.

Copies the elements of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection" /> to a one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
The style elements are copied to the <xref:System.Array> object in the same order in which they are indexed within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 스타일 요소가에 복사 되는 <xref:System.Array> 내에서 인덱스는 동일한 순서로 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The index, from the ordered list of types returned by <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.GetKnownTypes" />, of the type of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IStateManager" /> object to create.

Because the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.GetKnownTypes" /> method of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection" /> returns a list with only one type, the input <c>index</c> is ignored.

Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> class, based on the single element collection returned by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.GetKnownTypes" /> method.
An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> class.
Gets an array of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IStateManager" /> types that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection" /> can contain.

An array containing one <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> class, which indicates that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection" /> can contain <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> objects.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> to locate within the collection.
Returns the index of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object within the collection.
The zero-based index of the first occurrence of <paramref name="style" /> within the collection; otherwise, -1 if the style is not in the collection.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Contains%2A> method determines equality by using the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Contains%2A> 메서드를 사용 하 여 일치 여부를 확인는 <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> 에서 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location at which to insert the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object to insert into the collection.
Inserts a specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object into the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection" /> at the specified index location.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Insert%2A> method to insert a specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object into the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> object at a specified index location.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Insert%2A> 메서드를 지정 된 삽입 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> 개체에서 지정 된 인덱스 위치에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object at the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 추가 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> 의 끝에 있는 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> 개체를 가져오려면는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Add%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection" />.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object at the specified index location in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection" /> object.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object at the specified index in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 개체에서 지정 된 인덱스는 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> at the specified index, using simple array notation.
trans-unit.target: 이 인덱서를 사용 하 여 액세스 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> 에서 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> 단순 배열 표기법을 사용 하 여 지정 된 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The indexer allows you to modify or replace a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object in the collection directly.
trans-unit.target: 인덱서를 사용 하면 수정 하거나 바꿀 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> 컬렉션에서 직접 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object to remove from the collection.
Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection" /> object.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Remove%2A> method to remove the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Remove%2A> 메서드를 지정 된 제거 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> 에서 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: All items that follow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object are then moved up to fill in the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: 아래에 있는 모든 항목은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> 개체 위로 이동 하 여 빈 자리를 채웁니다.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: 이동된 된 항목의 인덱스도 업데이트 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: To remove a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> object at a specific index location, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 제거 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> 에서 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> 개체는 특정 인덱스 위치를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.RemoveAt%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: You can also remove every <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object in the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 제거할 수도 있습니다 모든 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> 사용 하 여 컬렉션의 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object to remove.
Removes the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object at the specified index location from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection" /> object.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method to remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object at a specified index location from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.RemoveAt%2A> 제거 하는 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> 개체에서 지정 된 인덱스 위치는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: All items that follow that <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object are then moved up to fill in the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: 그 뒤의 모든 항목 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> 개체 위로 이동 하 여 빈 자리를 채웁니다.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: 이동된 된 항목의 인덱스도 업데이트 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: To remove a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 특정을 제거 하려면 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> 에서 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection> 개체를 가져오려면는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection.Remove%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: You can also remove every <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object in the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 제거할 수도 있습니다 모든 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> 사용 하 여 컬렉션의 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object that should serialize itself completely.
Instructs the input <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object contained in the collection to record its entire state to view state, rather than recording only change information.
